system.description: The character can get what someone is signing.
system.effect: When the character encounters an unknown sign langange for the first time, they can make a Logic vs. TN action check to puzzle it out. If they already know any other version of the language, they have an edge. On a success they understand and can sign in the language. On a Fantastic success. they permanently understand and can sign it and never need to make a check for it again.
